    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aec-e04c-42f3-2934-b5216d5e33b8#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Monomakhos-korona.</string>
            <string language="en">Monomachos Crown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Monomachos Krone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Couronne de Monomachos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coroa De Monomachos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte superiore Di Monomachos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κορώνα Monomachos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corona De Monomachos</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Bizánci uralkodók, erényalakok és táncosnők rekeszzománcos ábrázolása félköríves lezárású aranylemezeken.</string>
            <string language="en">Cloissoné enamel pictures of Byzantine Rulers, Virtue figures and dancers on semicircular closed gold leafs</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  Monomakhos-korona,  IX. Konsztantinosz Monomakhosz,  rekeszzománc,  bizánci,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith's art, Mohomachos Crown, Constantinos Mohomachos IX., cloissoné enamel, Byzantine </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cloissoné Emailleabbildungen der byzantinischen 
Tabellierprogramm-, Tugendabbildungen und der Tänzer auf 
halbkreisförmigem geschlossenem Gold treibt Blätter</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les images d'émail de Cloissoné des chiffres 
bizantins de grilles de tabulation, de vertu et des danseurs sur l'or 
fermé semi-circulaire pousse des feuilles</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os retratos do esmalte de Cloissoné de figuras 
byzantine das réguas, do virtue e de dancers no ouro closed 
semicircular folheiam</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le immagini dello smalto di Cloissoné delle 
figure byzantine di virtù, dei righelli e dei ballerini su oro 
chiuso semicircolare frondeggia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι εικόνες σμάλτων Cloissonι των βυζαντινών 
κυβερνητών, των αριθμών αρετής και των χορευτών στον ημικυκλικό 
κλειστό χρυσό βγάζουν φύλλα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los cuadros del esmalte de Cloissoné de las 
figuras byzantine de las reglas, de la virtud y de los bailarines en 
el oro cerrado semicircular hojean</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst des Goldschmieds, Mohomachos Krone, Constantinos 
Mohomachos IX., cloissoné Emaille, byzantinisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art de l'orfèvre, couronne de Mohomachos, 
Constantinos Mohomachos IX., émail de cloissoné, bizantin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte do goldsmith, coroa de Mohomachos, Constantinos 
Mohomachos IX., esmalte do cloissoné, byzantine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte dell'orafo, parte superiore di Mohomachos, 
Constantinos Mohomachos IX., smalto del cloissoné, byzantine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η τέχνη του χρυσοχόου, Mohomachos κορώνα, Κωνσταντίνος 
Mohomachos IX., cloissonι σμαλτώνει, Βυζαντινός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte del orfebre, corona de Mohomachos, Constantinos 
Mohomachos IX., esmalte del cloissoné, byzantine</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
